entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
